descriptionHtml:
Here is the Master Shapeshifter Mod,

This mod is made completely by \'JackalHead\' I did NOT make it...

Visit JackalHead\'s youtube video presenting this mod, His other account is called \"AbPocalypse\"

You can see his video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nTrqUbSV7q0

To get the spell tomes type \'coc unownedcell\' into the console when in-game

1: Go in to your Inventory
2:click on them all one by one to learn the spells
3: Go to magic and find the Spells
4:Select what spell you want,
5: When in Gameplay press \"Z\" on Keyboard or \"RB\" on Xbox Controller
6: Bam! You have made it,

Note: Remember before your game, go into the directory and open up 
\"JackalHead Polymorph.exe\" Then ingame when polymorphed into a creature press \"F1\"

Known Problems: 
(Q) F1 Won\'t work on my laptop! 
(A) Hold \"fn\" then press \"F1\"

Good Luck!

CAUTION: Do NOT ask me about fixes for this mod because I did not create it, thus I cannot make Patches.
author: JackalHead
